description.fr:
Retire la {PropertyEffect:6[PÉTRIFICATION]} d'un {%FAMILY_CRAQUELEUR_NAME}, puis lui inflige {value:dmg,percent} de sa {%PVMAX}.
\---
Applique {PropertyEffect:101} aux {%FAMILY_CRAQUELEUR_NAME, plural:other} pour le tour.
\---
{%DestroyOnPlayed}
description.en:
Removes {PropertyEffect:6[PETRIFICATION]} from a {%FAMILY_CRAQUELEUR_NAME} then inflicts {value:dmg,percent} of their {%PVMAX} on them.
\---
Applies {PropertyEffect:101} on {%FAMILY_CRAQUELEUR_NAME, plural:other} for the turn.
\---
{%DestroyOnPlayed}
description.es:
Retira la {PropertyEffect:6[PETRIFICACIÓN]} de un {%FAMILY_CRAQUELEUR_NAME} y le inflige un {value:dmg,percent} de su {%PVMAX}.
\---
Aplica {PropertyEffect:101} a los {%FAMILY_CRAQUELEUR_NAME, plural:other} durante el turno.
\---
{%DestroyOnPlayed}
description.de:
Hebt die {PropertyEffect:6[VERSTEINERUNG]} von einem {%FAMILY_CRAQUELEUR_NAME} auf und verursacht bei ihm {value:dmg,percent} seiner {%PVMAX} als Schaden.
\---
Wendet {PropertyEffect:101} bei {%FAMILY_CRAQUELEUR_NAME, plural:other} für die Runde an.
\---
{%DestroyOnPlayed}
